description.value:
This component highlights a handle and links to the FAIR DO Scope.
It automatically generates colors for the parts of the handle (prefix and suffix) to make them easily distinguishable.

attributes.name: filled
attributes.description: Whether the component should use the filled or the outlined design.

attributes.name: handle
attributes.description: The Handle to highlight and link in this component.

attributes.name: link-to
attributes.description: An optional custom link to use instead of the default one which links to the FAIR DO Scope.

attributes.name: changing-colors
attributes.description: Should the table inside the component change colors every other line?

attributes.name: handle
attributes.description: The Handle to highlight and link in this component.

attributes.name: open-status
attributes.description: Should the details element be open by default?
